meanings.definition: A place where goods are sold to customers.
meanings.sent1: I went to the shops to buy some new clothes.
meanings.sent2: The shops in the mall offer a variety of products.
meanings.sent3: The shops were so crowded that I felt like a sardine in a can.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of memories, each shop holding a different story.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the shops illuminated the street, inviting customers inside.

meanings.definition: To visit a store or stores to browse or purchase goods.
meanings.sent1: She shops for groceries every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: They decided to shops for new furniture for their living room.
meanings.sent3: He shops like a professional, always finding the best deals.
meanings.sent4: Time shops for no one, so make the most of every moment.
meanings.sent5: The music blaring from the speakers made shopping feel like a party.
